Properties.ProtectedString:
local RELOAD_TIME = 10
local Create = LoadLibrary('RbxUtility').Create
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') local RocketScript = Tool:WaitForChild('RocketScript') local Player; local Character; local Torso; local Humanoid; local Equipped = false
local LastUse = Tool:WaitForChild('LastUse')
local Cursor_PlaceRocket = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=119809015' local Cursor_Reloading = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=119809109'
local ANIM_Hold = Tool:WaitForChild('ANIM_Hold') local ANIM_Place = Tool:WaitForChild('ANIM_Place') local Anim_Hold, Anim_Place;
local function IsReadyToFire() return (Workspace.DistributedGameTime - LastUse.Value) > RELOAD_TIME end
local function PlaceRocket() local rocket = Handle:Clone() rocket.CanCollide = true rocket.creator.Value = Player local sc = RocketScript:Clone() sc.Parent = rocket -- Anim_Place:Play() repeat until Anim_Place.KeyframeReached:wait() == 'Dropped' Handle.Transparency = 1 -- rocket.Parent = game.Workspace local curDir = rocket.CFrame.lookVector local at = rocket.Position + Torso.CFrame.lookVector*0.9 + Vector3.new(0, -0.5, 0) rocket.CFrame = CFrame.new(at, at + Vector3.new(curDir.x, 0, curDir.z)) rocket.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0) rocket.Velocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0) local correctGyro = Create'BodyGyro'{ Parent = rocket; maxTorque = Vector3.new(100,100,100); cframe = rocket.CFrame; } game.Debris:AddItem(correctGyro, 0.5) sc.Disabled = false -- for i = 1, 0, -0.06 do Handle.Transparency = i wait() end Handle.Transparency = 0 end
Tool.Equipped:connect(function(mouse) Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild('Humanoid') Torso = Character:WaitForChild('Torso') -- Anim_Hold = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(ANIM_Hold) Anim_Place = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(ANIM_Place) -- Anim_Hold:Play() -- if IsReadyToFire then mouse.Icon = Cursor_PlaceRocket else mouse.Icon = Cursor_Reloading while not IsReadyToFire() do wait() end if not Equipped then return end mouse.Icon = Cursor_PlaceRocket end -- mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() local elapsed = (Workspace.DistributedGameTime - LastUse.Value) if not IsReadyToFire() then return end LastUse.Value = Workspace.DistributedGameTime -- PlaceRocket() -- mouse.Icon = Cursor_Reloading wait(RELOAD_TIME) mouse.Icon = Cursor_PlaceRocket end) end)
Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() Equipped = false Handle.Transparency = 0 if Anim_Hold then Anim_Hold:Stop() end if Anim_Place then Anim_Place:Stop() end end)

function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local Tool = script.Parent.Parent
local armChildRemovedConn = nil local Motor6DGrip = nil local EquippedNum = 0
Tool.Equipped:connect(function() EquippedNum = EquippedNum + 1 local myEquip = EquippedNum --some vars local Player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) local Character = Player.Character
local rightarm = Character:FindFirstChild('Right Arm') if rightarm and rightarm:FindFirstChild('RightGrip') then local rightGrip = rightarm['RightGrip'] local handle = rightGrip.Part1
--kill my joint when the normal joint is removed --this must be done here so that the joint is removed --_right away_ after unequipping and the character doesn't --glitch up. local armChildRemovedConn = rightarm.ChildRemoved:connect(function(ch) if ch == rightGrip then Motor6DGrip:Remove() Motor6DGrip = nil -- if handle and Character:FindFirstChild('Torso') then if Tool.Parent.Parent:IsA('Player') then --the sword has been deselected --put the sword far away so the user doesn't notice that the handle doesn't --update for about 0.1 seconds after selecting the tool. handle.CFrame = CFrame.new(100000, 100000, 100000) else --if in the workspace, position the handle where it should be dropped --use the size of the handle to make sure it's dropped far enough away handle.CFrame = Character.Torso.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 0, -(handle.Size.magnitude+2)) end end end end)
--make my new joint Motor6DGrip = Create'Motor6D'{ Name = 'RightGrip_Motor', Part0 = rightarm, Part1 = handle, } --kill the old weld rightGrip.Part1 = nil rightGrip.Part0 = nil Motor6DGrip.Parent = rightGrip.Parent end end)
Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() EquippedNum = EquippedNum + 1 if armChildRemovedConn then armChildRemovedConn:disconnect() armChildRemovedConn = nil end end)

local Rocket = script.Parent local CreatorTag = Rocket:WaitForChild('creator') while not CreatorTag.Value do CreatorTag.Changed:wait() end local CreatorCharacter = CreatorTag.Value.Character local CreatedAt = tick()
local Firing = false
Spawn(function() wait(20) if not Firing then Rocket:Destroy() end end)
--
Rocket:WaitForChild('Place'):Play()
--
Rocket.Touched:connect(function(part) if Firing then return end if not part.Parent then return end local hum = part.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if not hum and part.Parent.Parent then hum = part.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') end -- don't shoot ourselves while placing if hum and hum.Parent == CreatorCharacter and (tick()-CreatedAt) < 1.2 then return end -- if hum then Firing = true DoEffect(hum.Parent) end end)
--
function DoEffect(character) -- Failsafe remove us game.Debris:AddItem(Rocket, 10)
-- Sound Rocket:WaitForChild('Swoosh'):Play()
-- light our fire Rocket.Fire.Enabled = true
-- Platform stand them in preparation character.Humanoid.PlatformStand = true
-- local torso = character:FindFirstChild('Torso') if not torso then return end
-- Attach the rocket to them local w = Instance.new('Weld', torso) w.Part0 = w.Parent w.Part1 = Rocket w.C0 = CFrame.new(0,0.6,1.2)
-- Rocket them up local pushforce = Instance.new('BodyVelocity', torso) pushforce.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 10000, 0) pushforce.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 20, 0)
-- Wait for them to go up a bit wait(3)
-- Detach ourself and make us fly away w:Destroy() Rocket.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, Rocket.Velocity.y, 0) - torso.CFrame.lookVector*20 Rocket.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(math.random(-2,2), math.random(-2,2), math.random(-2,2)) Rocket.Fire.Enabled = false
-- Stop the rocket sound Rocket:WaitForChild('Swoosh'):Stop()
-- Kill the effects on the character pushforce:Destroy()
-- Make them glide local glideScript = script:FindFirstChild('GlideScript') if glideScript then local sc = glideScript:Clone() sc.Parent = character sc.Disabled = false end
-- Fade us out for i = 1, 0, -0.1 do wait() Rocket.Transparency = i end
Rocket:Destroy() end

local Create = LoadLibrary('RbxUtility').Create
------------------------------------------------------------------ --| Main Globals |-- ------------------------------------------------------------------ local Character = script.Parent local Torso = Character:WaitForChild('Torso') local Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild('Humanoid')
local Glider;
local FlyingVelo; local FlyingGyro;
local FlyAnimSource = Create'Animation'{ Name = 'FlyGliderAnim'; Parent = Character; AnimationId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=119783214'; } local FlyAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(FlyAnimSource)
------------------------------------------------------------------ --| Setup functions |-- ------------------------------------------------------------------ local function CreateGlider() Glider = Create'Part'{ Parent = Character; FormFactor = 'Custom'; Size = Vector3.new(0.2,0.2,0.2); TopSurface = 'Smooth'; BottomSurface = 'Smooth'; -- Create'SpecialMesh'{ MeshType = 'FileMesh'; MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=119780517'; TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=119779068'; }; -- Create'Sound'{ Name = 'Deploy'; SoundId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=119877640'; }; } local weld = Create'Weld'{ Parent = Torso; Part0 = Torso; Part1 = Glider; C0 = CFrame.Angles(0.2, 0, 0)*CFrame.new(0, 5.2, -0.1); } end
local function StopFlying() Humanoid.PlatformStand = false Glider:Destroy() FlyAnimSource:Destroy() FlyAnim:Stop() FlyingGyro:Destroy() FlyingVelo:Destroy() script:Destroy() end
local function OnPartTouched(other) if other.Name == 'Handle' then return end if not other:IsDescendantOf(Character) then StopFlying() end end
local function RecursiveConnectTouched(obj) for _, ch in pairs(obj:GetChildren()) do if ch:IsA('BasePart') then ch.Touched:connect(OnPartTouched) else RecursiveConnectTouched(ch) end end end
------------------------------------------------------------------ --| Flight Controlls |-- ------------------------------------------------------------------ local CurrentFlightHeading;
local function SetupCharacterForFlight() Humanoid.PlatformStand = true -- local torsoCF = Torso.CFrame local dir = Vector3.new(torsoCF.lookVector.x, 0, torsoCF.lookVector.z) CurrentFlightHeading = dir.unit -- FlyingVelo = Create'BodyVelocity'{ Name = 'GliderFlyingVelo'; Parent = Torso; velocity = Vector3.new(); maxForce = Vector3.new(10000,10000,10000); } FlyingGyro = Create'BodyGyro'{ Name = 'GliderFlyingGyro'; Parent = Torso; cframe = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(), CurrentFlightHeading); maxTorque = Vector3.new(10000,10000,10000); } end
local function Slerp(t, a, b) local om = math.acos(math.min(1, a:Dot(b))) if om < 0.01 then return (1-t)*a + t *b else return (math.sin((1-t)*om)/math.sin(om))*a + (math.sin( t *om)/math.sin(om))*b end end
local TURN_ALPHA = math.pi * 0.8 -- per second local MAX_SPEED = 40 local DESCENT_SPEED = 15
local function DoFlight(dt) local camCF = Workspace.CurrentCamera.CoordinateFrame local desiredHeading = (camCF * CFrame.Angles(0.2, 0, 0)).lookVector -- -- HAXX :Dot in this case shouldn't be > 1, but it sometimes is ~1.000001 -- due to FP error, killing the arccos and nuking the character. local thetaBetween = math.acos(math.min(1, desiredHeading:Dot(CurrentFlightHeading))) local allowedTheta = TURN_ALPHA * dt if thetaBetween < allowedTheta then CurrentFlightHeading = desiredHeading else local frac = allowedTheta / thetaBetween CurrentFlightHeading = Slerp(frac, CurrentFlightHeading, desiredHeading) end if CurrentFlightHeading ~= CurrentFlightHeading then StopFlying() end -- local speedMod = (-CurrentFlightHeading.y + 1) / 2 -- 1 when going straight down local liftMod = math.min(0, CurrentFlightHeading.y) -- local dirXZ = Vector3.new(CurrentFlightHeading.x, 0, CurrentFlightHeading.z).unit -- local tilt = math.min(4, math.max(-4, Torso.RotVelocity.y)) -- FlyingVelo.velocity = dirXZ*speedMod*MAX_SPEED + Vector3.new(0, liftMod, 0)*DESCENT_SPEED FlyingGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(), CurrentFlightHeading) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, tilt/8) end
------------------------------------------------------------------ --| Call setup |-- ------------------------------------------------------------------ CreateGlider() SetupCharacterForFlight() RecursiveConnectTouched(Character) Glider.Deploy:Play() FlyAnim:Play(0.2)
------------------------------------------------------------------ --| Main Flight Loop |-- ------------------------------------------------------------------ local LastTime = tick() while true do local thisTime = tick() local dt = thisTime-LastTime LastTime = thisTime -- DoFlight(dt) -- wait() end
